definition: first sign of budding talent/to display one's ability for the first time
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
point of a spear/edge of a tool/vanguard/forward (in sports team)
awn (of cereals)/arista (of grain)/tip (of a blade)/Miscanthus sinensis (type of grass)/variant of 邙, Mt Mang at Luoyang in Henan

sentences.english: But developing-country banks now have got things right on a number of fronts.
sentences.chinese: 但是發展中國家銀行已經開始初露鋒芒。

sentences.english: The young man displayed his talent for the first time in the scientific and technological circles.
sentences.chinese: 那個青年人在科技界初露鋒芒。

sentences.english: Golden Week holidays, the beginning of fire directed suburbs commercial real estate.
sentences.chinese: 十一黃金週期間，郊區商業地產開始初露鋒芒。
